title: Rookie In Love
description: He’s beneath her… And that’s exactly where she wants him, like she’s never wanted anything — or anyone — before. Madeline’s been a good girl all her life. Since the loss of her mother she’s been willing to be guided by her father and brothers. Now, in her last year of college, she’s found Jackson. He makes her feel … everything. More aware. Exquisitely sensitive. Reckless with need. But Jackson’s a football star with a reputation...can he give her the life her family wants for her?
author: Sarah White
